Ritabhari Chakraborty Wiki | Biography | Height | Movies | Photos

Bolly Reporter
8 months ago

Ritabhari Chakraborty is an Indian Bengali film and television actress. She brought up in Kolkata and started her career early in modeling and television at the age of 15.

Biography & Wiki

Ritabhari Chakraborty’s nickname is Paulin. She was born on 26 June 1992 in Kolkata, West Bengal, India. Hence, her current age is 27 years. Ritabhari’s Zodiac is Cancer.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Height in Centimeters170 cm
Height in meters1.70 m
Height in Inches5’ 7″
Weight in Kilograms50 kg
Weight in Pounds110 lbs
Eye ColorDark Brown
Hair ColorBlack
Figure Measurements32-29-32

Family Members

Ritabhari Chakraborty is a very gorgeous actress who belongs to a Bengali film background family. Her father name Utpalendu Chakrabarty who is a filmmaker and Her Mother’s name is Satarupa Sanyal who is a film director. She has one sister named, Chitrangada Chakraborty who is also an actress of Tollywood.

Education and School, College

Ritabhari completed her schooling at Hariyana Vidya Mandir, Kolkata, India. After that, she completed her graduation in History from Jadavpur University, Kolkata, India.

Apart from her acting career, she is also known for topping ISC exams in History and Bengali in the year 2011.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

As per media, Ritabhari has a relationship with famous film director Srijit Mukherji.

Ritabhari Chakraborty filmography

Ritabhari made her first appearance in television as the female protagonist of the popular Indian Bengali television serial Ogo Bodhu Sundari. The serial was remade into Hindi as Sasural Genda Phool. In 2011, she was reported to be making her big-screen debut in Tomar Shange Praner Khela. The film was directed by Rakesh Kumar, who also directed Sasural Genda Phool. The story of the film explores the relationship between the female protagonist with five men. Later she worked in other films like Barood and Tobu Basanta.

Her first Hindi film was “Pari” which released on March 2, 2018, and also stars Anushka Sharma.

2012Tobuo Basanta
2014Chotushkone, Once Upon a Time in Kolkata
2015Bawal, Onyo apalaa, Barood
2016Colkatay Columbus

2018Pari

Other works

Ritabhari Chakraborty is Featured in numerous magazines and advertisements, she is quite well known in the advertising industry as well and has endorsed more than 100 brands like Chandrani Pearls, Rupayan Jewellers, Shehnaz, Rajlaxmi Jewellers, etc.

Ritabhari Chakraborty and her mother run an NGO “Scud Society for Social Communication ” which primarily focuses on the development of women in rural areas in West Bengal (currently involved with Bashtala) . She was the ambassador of the Dog Owners and Lovers association (DOLA) and is also known for her charitable works for the “Ideal school for the deaf”.

Awards & Recognitions

She recipient Star Jalsha Entertainment Awards, Protidin Tele Somman and Uttar Kumar Kala Ratna Awards for Best Actor.

Salary and Net Worth

Ritabhari Chakraborty has a net worth of $1 million dollars as of 2019. She is taking 20-30 lakh per movie as salary.

Facts About Ritabhari Chakraborty

  • At the age of 15, she started her career in TV and modeling.
  • She is the brand ambassador of various leading brands.
  • Apart from modeling, she also worked in various Bengali TV serials and movies.
  • In 2017, she was seen opposite Ayushmann Khurrana in the music video ‘Orrey Mon’.
  • In 2017, Ritabhari appeared in a short film with Kalki Koechlin titled “Naked”.
